1182.SR.long_name: Amlak International for Real Estate Finance Company
1182.SR.summary: Amlak International for Real Estate Finance Company provides real estate finance in Saudi Arabia. The company operates through Retail and Corporate segments. It also provides finance products to small and medium sized businesses, and individuals; and financing products to corporate, high net worth individuals, and institutional customers. Amlak International for Real Estate Finance Company was founded in 2007 and is headquartered in Riyadh, the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.
